title: Inside Stacey Solomon's luxury beach break as she whisks kids away to paradise without Joe Swash

Stacey Solomon has jetted off on the ultimate luxe beach getaway with her kids.

The presenter whisked her three sons Leighton, seven, Zach, 11, and newborn Rex away to the tropical paradise for some sun.

Proud Stacey started documenting the trip on her Instagram stories from the moment they strolled through the airport terminal.

The mother-of-three captured her fun-loving son Zach leaping into the pool while Rex and Leighton got some shut eye.

In another snap, Stacey cuddled up to her boys while they watched the sun set on the beach.

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

Another fabulous picture showed the family enjoying their afternoon at the sun-soaked beach.

Before exploring, Stacey made sure she unpacked her clothes and neatly packed her bras into the drawers at the hotel.

The Loose Women star also tidied away her son's clothes into the wardrobes available to ensure they were unpacked for the break.

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

She wrote: "We made it! Leighton and Rex are fast asleep, Zach is straight in the pool in his pants and mummy is going to do her favourite thing - unpack!"

Stacey's love and Rex's dad Joe Swash was noticeably absent from their sun-scorched holiday.

The presenter had joined the Solomon clan on an autumnal outing before they jetted off overseas.

However, Joe was nowhere to be seen when Stacey arrived at the airport with the three kids.

Stacey has been sharing the journey with her 2.3million followers.
description: Stacey's love and Rex's dad Joe Swash was noticeably absent from their sun-scorched holiday as the family jetted overseas
